Summary: Authentication & User Management
Description: User registration login and profile management system

Summary: As a user, I want to register with email and password so that I can access the platform
As a user, I want to log in securely so that I can access my account
As a researcher, I want to create my professional profile during signup so that nonprofits can find me
As a nonprofit, I want to create my organization profile during signup so that researchers know about us
As a user, I want to verify my email address so that my account is secure
As a user, I want to enable multi-factor authentication so that my account is protected
As a user, I want to log in with Google or Microsoft so that I don't need another password
As a user, I want to update my profile information so that it stays current
As a user, I want to change my password so that I can keep my account secure
As a user, I want to manage notification preferences so that I control what emails I receive
As a nonprofit, I want to update my organization details so that researchers have accurate information
As a researcher, I want to update my professional profile so that nonprofits see my latest skills
As a researcher, I want to add my academic history so that nonprofits see my qualifications
As a researcher, I want to add my certifications so that nonprofits trust my expertise
As a user, I want to delete my account so that I can leave the platform if needed
Project Management
Description: Project brief creation editing and milestone tracking system

Summary: As a nonprofit, I want to create project briefs so that researchers can find opportunities
As a nonprofit, I want to edit my project briefs so that I can update requirements
As a nonprofit, I want to delete draft projects so that I can remove unwanted ideas
As a nonprofit, I want to set project status to control visibility
As a nonprofit, I want to add budget information so that researchers know the compensation
As a nonprofit, I want to specify required methods so that I get qualified researchers
As a nonprofit, I want to set data sensitivity levels so that researchers know the requirements
As a nonprofit, I want to break projects into milestones so that I can track progress
As a nonprofit, I want to create milestones with due dates so that work stays on schedule
As a nonprofit, I want to update milestone status so that everyone sees progress
As a nonprofit, I want to mark milestones complete so that we track achievements
As a nonprofit, I want to see overdue milestones so that I can take action
As a nonprofit, I want to see milestone completion rates so that I know project health
As a nonprofit, I want to delete milestones that are no longer needed
Discovery & Browsing
Description: Public project browsing and search functionality

Summary: As a researcher, I want to browse projects without logging in so that I can explore opportunities
As a researcher, I want to search projects by keywords so that I find relevant work
As a researcher, I want to filter projects by domain so that I find my specialty
As a researcher, I want to filter projects by methods so that I find work I can do
As a researcher, I want to filter projects by budget so that I find paid opportunities
As a researcher, I want to see project details publicly so that I can decide if I'm interested
As a researcher, I want to see organization information so that I know who I'd work with
As a researcher, I want to see project timelines so that I can plan my schedule
Matching System
Description: Intelligent matching between researchers and projects

Summary: As a researcher, I want to see suggested project matches so that I find relevant opportunities
As a researcher, I want to see match scores so that I know how well I fit
As a researcher, I want to accept or reject matches so that I control what I pursue
As a researcher, I want to see why I was matched so that I understand the algorithm
As a nonprofit, I want to see suggested researcher matches so that I find qualified talent
As a nonprofit, I want to see researcher profiles so that I can evaluate candidates
As a nonprofit, I want to invite researchers to projects so that I can recruit them
As a nonprofit, I want to see researcher availability so that I know when they can start
As a nonprofit, I want to see researcher rates so that I can budget appropriately
As an admin, I want to configure matching weights so that results improve over time
As an admin, I want to see matching algorithm performance so that I can optimize it
Agreements & Collaboration
Description: Electronic agreement creation signing and management

Summary: As a nonprofit, I want to send agreement offers to researchers so that we can formalize collaboration
As a researcher, I want to review agreement terms so that I understand the commitment
As a researcher, I want to sign agreements electronically so that we can start work quickly
As a nonprofit, I want to sign agreements electronically so that we can start work quickly
As a user, I want to see all my agreements so that I track my commitments
As a user, I want to download signed agreements so that I have records
As a user, I want to terminate agreements if needed so that I can exit collaborations
As a user, I want agreement templates for NDAs so that I protect sensitive information
As a user, I want agreement templates for DUAs so that I comply with data regulations
Messaging & Communication
Description: Real-time messaging system with file attachments

Summary: As a user, I want to send messages to other users so that I can communicate
As a user, I want to receive messages from other users so that we can collaborate
As a user, I want to see unread message counts so that I don't miss important messages
As a user, I want to mark messages as read so that I can track what I've seen
As a user, I want to see message history so that I can review conversations
As a user, I want to delete messages so that I can clean up my inbox
As a user, I want real-time message notifications so that I respond quickly
As a user, I want to attach files to messages so that I can share documents
As a user, I want to search my messages so that I can find information
File Management
Description: File upload download and storage management

Summary: As a nonprofit, I want to upload project documents so that researchers have context
As a researcher, I want to upload deliverables so that nonprofits can review my work
As a user, I want to download files so that I can work offline
As a user, I want to see file upload progress so that I know when it's complete
As a user, I want to delete files I uploaded so that I can remove outdated documents
As an admin, I want to set file size limits so that we control storage costs
As an admin, I want to scan files for viruses so that the platform stays secure
As a user, I want to organize files in folders so that I can stay organized
Reviews & Ratings
As a nonprofit, I want to rate researchers after projects so that others know their quality
As a researcher, I want to rate nonprofits after projects so that others know their reputation
As a user, I want to write detailed reviews so that I can provide helpful feedback
As a user, I want to see reviews before collaborating so that I make informed decisions
As a user, I want to see average ratings so that I can quickly assess reputation
As a user, I want to respond to reviews so that I can provide context
As an admin, I want to moderate reviews so that we maintain quality standards
Admin Dashboard & Moderation
As an admin, I want to see platform statistics so that I understand usage
As an admin, I want to view all users so that I can manage accounts
As an admin, I want to suspend user accounts so that I can handle violations
As an admin, I want to approve pending users so that we control quality
As an admin, I want to delete users permanently so that I can remove bad actors
As an admin, I want to view all projects so that I can monitor content
As an admin, I want to approve project briefs so that we maintain quality
As an admin, I want to reject project briefs with feedback so that nonprofits improve them
As an admin, I want to request changes to projects so that they meet standards
As an admin, I want to view all organizations so that I can verify legitimacy
As an admin, I want to view all milestones so that I can track platform progress
As an admin, I want to view audit logs so that I can track system changes
As an admin, I want to see pending approvals so that I can process them quickly
As an admin, I want to see suspended accounts so that I can review them
System Administration
Description: System monitoring SLA tracking and platform configuration

Summary: As an admin, I want to monitor SLA compliance so that we meet service standards
As an admin, I want to see system health metrics so that I can prevent outages
As an admin, I want to configure email templates so that communications are consistent
As an admin, I want to manage platform settings so that I can control behavior
As an admin, I want to run database backups so that we don't lose data
As an admin, I want to view error logs so that I can troubleshoot issues
As an admin, I want to generate usage reports so that stakeholders have insights
